==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ねん|ど|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
Uncertain. Possibly from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ねんど}} {{m|ltc|年度}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|年度|tr=niándù}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-accent-common|a|ね|んど}}<ref>{{R:NHK Hatsuon}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[nẽ̞ɴdo̞]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ねんど}}

# a [[year]], for [[administrative]], [[academic]], [[business]], or [[accounting]] purposes: may start at some time other than [[New Years]]
# {{qualifier|more specifically}} a [[financial year]] {{qualifier|UK}}, a [[fiscal year]] {{qualifier|US}}
# {{qualifier|more specifically}} a [[school year]]
